api.errors.fetchErrorMessage.defaultMessage: Unexpected client error ({error}). Please try again.

api.errors.genericMessage.defaultMessage: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

api.errors.genericMessageWithCode.defaultMessage: The server returned an unexpected resonse ({code}). Please try again.

api.errors.parsingErrorMessage.defaultMessage: Error parsing server response ({error}). Please try again.

app.contactUsSuccess.message.defaultMessage: Thanks for your message. We'll get back to you soon.

auth.VerifyEmailNotificationBanner.email.defaultMessage: Please confirm your email. We've send a message to <e>{emailAddress}</e>.
auth.VerifyEmailNotificationBanner.email.description: The message asking the user to confirm their email address when an email has been sent

auth.flowError.redirecting.defaultMessage: {reason, select, session_refresh_required {Reauthentication required. } browser_location_change_required {} session_aal2_required {2FA required. } other {}}Redirecting...

auth.flowRestarted.message.defaultMessage: The form had to be reloaded{reason, select, security_csrf_violation { because the security token expired.} security_identity_mismatch { because your session changed} self_service_flow_expired { because the form expired} self_service_flow_return_to_forbidden { because the return URL is invalid} other {}}. Please try again.
auth.flowRestarted.message.description: The message telling the user that the form they submitted had to be reloaded

auth.loggedInAlreadyNotice.messageWithUs.description: The message telling the user that they are already logged in when their username is available

auth.loggedInAlreadyNotice.messageWithou.description: The message telling the user that they are already logged in when their username is not available

auth.login.signUpInsteadMessage.defaultMessage: Don't have an account yet? <link>Sign up!</link>
auth.login.signUpInsteadMessage.description: The message shown on the login page that directs the user to create an account instead of logging in.

auth.loginForm.oidcDividerText.description: The text displayed in the divider that shows additional login options

auth.loginFormTitle.2fa.description: The title displayed at the top of the login form when requesting the user's 2FA code

auth.loginFormTitle.confirmAccess.description: The title displayed at the top of the login form when the user is already logged in but we need them to enter their password again to reconfirm their access

auth.loginFormTitle.login.description: The title displayed at the top of the login form when logging in

auth.passwordInput.togglePasswordVisibil.description: The hint text shown when hovering over the button that toggles the visibility of the users password.

auth.recovery.title.description: The title displayed at the top of the password recovery form

auth.recoveryLink.label.description: The text displayed for a link that takes you to the account recovery page

auth.registration.title.description: The title displayed at the top of the registration form

auth.registrationForm.oidcDividerText.description: The text displayed in the divider that shows additional registration options

auth.settings.oidcSection.title.description: The heading displayed at the top of the change password section of the settings form

auth.settingsForm.changePasswordSection..description: The heading displayed at the top of the change password section of the settings form

auth.verification.title.description: The title displayed at the top of the verification form

common.loadingSpinner.label.description: The screen reader text to show for the spinning loading indicator

errors.notFoundPage.errorCode.description: Additional text on the error page that indicates this is a '404' error code

errors.notFoundPage.heading.description: The text shown at the top of the not found page

errors.notFoundPage.message.defaultMessage: We can't seem to find that page.
errors.notFoundPage.message.description: Error message shown on the not found page below the heading

errors.notFoundPage.title.description: The title shown in the browser tab/window for the not found page

i18n.localErrorToast.title.description: The toast message shown when a locale fails to load
